Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: a painting of a male mouse

Dio is a towering statuesque mouse, with uneven, sleek light brown fur, and long light white hair, worn loose with caged braids. He has a goatee which is long. Large honey brown eyes are set above a long nose and a heart-shaped mouth, complete with curved lips. A lack of claws, on long hands, and large feet are also visible. You also note his light eyebrows and large ears. He wears a black leather satchel, a gold Goldengate ring, a rose embroidered white goldweave bellcloak, a pair of gold-etched silver bracers, a pair of fiery gold lizard skin pantaloons, a pair of gold-inlaid black suede knee-high boots, a silver necklace of the Octogram of Creation, a vibrant white suede cavalier hat, a vibrant white iridescent goldweave ruffled shirt, a cartouche, a decorated gold barpin and a pair of midnight black goldweave formal gloves. He is sitting on a high-backed rosewood chair in the western area of a entrance hall to a archery range. He sits alone, his eyes settled downward, staring at a small black book that lie open upon his lap. His face expresses a look of a mind at work.
This painting appears to be of terrible quality.
It is signed by Melody.
A painting of a male mouse in rich clothing.
